name: Friday Night Quentin
description:
A Mod for Friday Night Funkin'

Forget about BF. Forget about GF. In fact, forget about Earth. You're on Axar V now. What's Axar V? It's pretty much like Earth, except there's cool tech and teenagers are green.

Your name is Quentin, and you have crippling social anxiety. I know. It sucks. But when you start crushing on a girl named Duplex and people who don't like that start coming after you - including her scary older brother - you've either gotta put your brown pants on and hope you don't die, or stand up and belt your feelings out. Your choice. Whatcha gonna do?

Why do I Care?

Aw come on, don't you wanna help a kid overcome his shyness and blossom into a social butterfly? Isn't that something that could bring you fulfillment in life?

Just kidding. We added notes that scroll at 2x speed. We hope it's hard. Good luck.

What's In The Mod?
  • New playable character Quentin
  • Week Q, featuring THREE NEW SONGS against THREE NEW FOES
  • Easy/Normal/Hard difficulties included!
  • The Axans have taken over the title screen, menu, and tutorial
  • 2x scroll speed notes (available in the chart editor!)
  • There might be one or two other things
Da Code

Check out my sweet sweet source code here.

Dem Aliens

Thank you so much for playing!
